data.name: Ableford
data.detailed_description:
A cute little town with a few occupants, Ableford was founded in 2003 by Tom the Turtle. Lots has changed over the years, and you're the town's newest citizen, Casey. But there is more to this town than initially obvious.

Meet the residents of Ableford:
  • Tom the Turtle
  • Amy the Cat
  • Noël the reindeer
  • Keith the █̸͔̮̖̺̆̅̐̚█̴̝̰̥̫͕̑͑█̶̨̡̞͎͔̳͓̠̹̙̰̬͐̉̅̐͝
  • Ben the Goose
  • And so many more!

Do some odd jobs around town so you can complete your mysterious machine! Like finding Tom's missing books and delivering Amy's coffees for her while she's busy.

Explore the funny (and sometimes a little spooky) town of Ableford. Once you start you'll never stop!

data.short_description: A 2d exploration game. You play as Casey and do some odd jobs for folks around town so you can build your machine.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 960
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 1060
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
